title: Garden of the Moon
description: After she inherits a plantation in 1850, Sara Wade jumps at the chance to live there on her own, but her ability to see ghosts causes her to discover two specters in the stately home--one whose love for her in another lifetime has endured beyond the grave, and another who is determined to drive Sara and her phantom lover apart, even if it means killing her. Original.
author: Elizabeth Sinclair
